message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I think it would be a great fit for you and I'm sure you'll get a lot of use out of it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $150 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal.  How about we meet in the middle at $165?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I'd like to propose a price of $145 for the product.
